A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
From start to finish.  So many things that did not even make common sense.  Bomb's dropping down in space ??  A whole armada of Star Destroyers who were the bad ass ship's of the empire\, just do nothing but watch a huge dreadnaught class ship fight..  on and on things that don't flow with common sense.

An ending that didn't leave me wanting to see the next episode.  All previous 7 at least gave me that urge. This one just was left a sour taste in my mouth and feel I had a better time watching Justice League.

So now the whole Skywalker family is dead...  The major side story between Jedi and Dark Jedi is gone.  What's left is just a huge boring war you can watch by  playing battlefront...
